name: RED CURSE
description:
Click here to play on WebGL

Red Curse is a horror FPS game, designed as a dungeon similar to old games like doom. In addition to creating mysterious and scary dungeons using darkness and mazes. Make players feel pressured and excited at the same time.

The Wizard was struck by a mysterious curse that transformed his right arm into an extremely powerful demonic arm, but he himself suffered from arm pain. The only clue that will save him from the curse. It's a demon from hell, The Eye.

HOW TO PLAY
W / A / S  / D = Walk
Left mouse click = Shoot
